original_text: From the high rocks, eagles look for their food. They see small animals far away, that they can catch and eat. From the high rocks, eagles look for their food. korean_text: 거기서 먹이를 살피나니 그 눈이 멀리 봄이며

sentences.original_text: They see small animals far away,
that they can catch and eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 잡아서 먹을 수 있는 것들을.
